00010     template <class T>
00011     static inline vector<T> parseVector( const string& vec, bool& success, bool printDebug, char delim = ',' )
00012     {
00013         vector<T> ret;
00014         for( unsigned int i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i )
00015         {
00016             string entry = "";
00017             while( i < vec.size() && vec[i] != ',' )
00018             {
00019                 entry += vec[i];
00020                 ++i;
00021             }
00022             success = false;            
00023             T tmp;
00024             tmp = convert( entry, success, tmp, printDebug );
00025             if( !success )
00026             {
00027                 //logger.print( "Warning: conversion failed in parseVector", printDebug );
00028                 return ret;
00029             }
00030             ret.push_back( tmp );
00031         }
00032         success = true;
00033         return ret;
00034     }

00036     static inline int stringToInteger( string number, bool& success, bool printDebug )
00037     {
00038         success = true;
00039         try
00040         {
00041             return lexical_cast<int>( number ); 
00042         }
00043         catch( const exception& e )
00044         {
00045             //logger.print( "Warning: in Utility::stringToInteger, cast failed: " + lexical_cast<string>(e.what()) + " input was: " + number, printDebug );
00046             success = false;
00047             return 0xffffffff;
00048         }
00049     }
00050 
00051     static inline int convert( string val, bool& success, const int type, bool printDebug )
00052     {

00054         if( !success )
00055         {
00056             //logger.print( "Warning: in convert, conversion of: " + val + " to integer failed", printDebug );

00058         return ret;
